name: Turncoat Rodent
description:
Uh oh! Boiling mold penetrates every grain and crack of Skeeks' Cluttered Garage World. Can he escape through the brass gate, or will his osteopores feed the festering mass?

Enjoy a scrolling platform game with speed and weird flutter-jumps.

-After the FIRST JUMP, one gets 2-3 MORE JUMPS in a limited window of time. This is thanks to Skeeks' flappy coat.

-PROPELLERS can be slid across and even used to 'SEE-SAW' into the air! I assure you, it's fun.

SFX from artisticdude - 'RPG Sound Pack': https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack
Music from GoDieGo. Tracks: 'Eat', 'Eat Eat', and 'Eat Eat Eat' from Nobuhiko Obayashi's classic fantasy-horror film: 'Hausu'

All textures and artwork created by myself.
Share as you wish.
